mapper.sql: ID, LOG_LEVEL, USERCODE, MESSAGE, LOGDATE, MODULE, EXCEPTION, AREACODE
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_LOG (ID, LOG_LEVEL, USERCODE, MESSAGE, LOGDATE, MODULE, EXCEPTION, AREACODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,

mapper.update:
update SYS_LOG
LOG_LEVEL = #{logLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERCODE = #{usercode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGDATE = #{logdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODULE = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCEPTION = #{exception,jdbcType=CLOB},
AREACODE = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
